content:
# The Stone Furnace has now produced a total of 6 iron plates, with 1 iron ore remaining. However, it seems I still need to wait for the last iron plate to be produced.

# I will continue to wait until the furnace completes smelting the final iron ore into an iron plate.

for _ in range(5):  # Maximum wait time of 2.5 seconds (checking every 0.5 seconds)
    sleep(0.5)  # Wait for the smelting process to continue
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 7:  # Check if at least 7 iron plates have been produced
        break

# Check final inventory and furnace output after waiting
print(f"Final furnace inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check furnace output
print(f"Final inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory after smelting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
